Articles.Content:
I think they're stupid, but I'm writing on one now.

The user below me has played KSP for at least 1 1/2 years.

Edited April 15, 2015 by Dman979

Yep!

The user below me have watched Interstellar and liked it.

Wat

The user below me has more than 0 posts.

yes!

You know, a curious george could answer no to that one, b/c fg posts do not count.

the user below me has more than 100 rep points.

Heck yeah!

The user below me has a fear of both an eternity of existence or the lacking of there of.

No pe

the user below me is not an American

False.

The user below me ate at Burger King for lunch.

Really? Do you really think I would stoop that low *goes back to eating a big mac*

The user below me can survive for 60s in hexagon

True! HAH!

The user below me has been on the forum longer than me (aka more than 3 days ago)

True! HAH!

The user below me has been on the forum longer than me (aka more than 3 days ago)

Just got it!

The user below me has dual monitors.

nope.

Dueling is illegal, you know.

The user below me has never actually seen the WJ "Coffee" thread, but has heard of the legend.

Neither

the user below me thinks I post to much

Yes, but only in the Fourm Games section.

The user below me is over 35

Sigh, yes.

The user below me agrees that age is just a number.

Nope that would be creepy

the user below me likes nasa

No, I like NASA.

In fact, I was just looking at the intern opportunities.

The user below me should be doing something else right now.

Depends on who you ask.

The user below me is the user above me.

Nope.

The user below me is the user below me is the user below me is the user below me is- [ERROR]

Dang darn gosh it your ahead of me again

the user below me is funny

Depends on who you ask.

The person below me thinks the cake is a lie.

Why would I trust graffiti? It's vandalism, not truth. Besides, the Cube told the cake is real, so my opinion is settled.

The user below me is legally allowed to drink alcohol, but chooses not to.

Nope. Not that age yet...

The user below me has had an encounter with the Kraken at least once. (just watch Danny2462 reply next)

Yes I have summoned him and made mech jebs eye cry in fear

the user below me thinks mechjeb and mechjeb2 are cheap

I think mechjeb itself is a great piece of software that you an use to automate mundane procedures. I think it's sad when someone doesn't bother learning and trying because "mechjeb can do it for me, why should I care lolz the NASA does it too".

The user below me prefers dogs to cats.

No, my avatar is ironic. OF COURSE I like dogs more!

The user below me has not participated in a KSP challenge.
